diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $15$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $x$ units.
The measure of angle $CBA$ is $60$ degrees.
The length of the line $AB$ is $y$ units.
The line $AC$ is perpendicular to the line $BC$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$, forming a right triangle $ABC$.
